alert.note: Alert for Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 4:54PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A snow shower will affect Central Linn county through 515 PM CST... At 445 PM CST, a snow shower was located over Hiawatha, or near Cedar Rapids, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Snow and winds in excess of 30 mph. Snow accumulation up to a half inch on grassy surfaces. SOURCE...Radar and area web cameras. IMPACTS...Difficulty seeing while driving. Accumulations of up to one half inch are expected. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Marion, Hiawatha, Robins, Central City, Alburnett, Bertram, Toddville, Waubeek, Howard H Cherry Scout Reservation, Squaw Creek Park, Linn County Fairgrounds, Pinicon Ridge Park, Marion Airport, Lafayette, and Morgan Creek Park. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 18 and 33. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
